headline: Why L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (LHX) Is Gaining This Week?
summary: We recently published a list of Why These Defense Stocks Are Gaining This Week. In this article, we are going to take a look at where L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:LHX) stands against other defense stocks that are gaining this week. America’s defense sector has been shaky since Trump’s return to the White House, amid mixed […]
